players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, watch out. I'm Charlie, mafioso. Stay cautious."
You: "Charlie, thanks for the info. Investigate Bob and I to gather clues."
Bob: "Charlie warned me; be cautious. Investigating you, Alice."
Bob: "Charlie confirmed mafioso, Alice investigated me. Stay alert."
You: "Charlie, thanks for the warning. Bob, stay vigilant."
Charlie: "Bob, watch each other closely. I eliminated Diana last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Charlie, thanks for the info. Investigate Bob and I to gather clues."
You: "Charlie warned me; be cautious. Investigating you, Alice."
You: "Charlie confirmed mafioso, Alice investigated me. Stay alert."
Alice: "Charlie, thanks for the warning. Bob, stay vigilant."
Charlie: "Bob, watch each other closely. I eliminated Diana last night."
